above this? public void newSummonedNPC(int npcType, int x, int y, int heightLevel, int rangex1, int rangey1, int rangex2, int rangey2, int WalkingType, int HP, boolean Respawns, int summonedBy) { // first, search for a free slot int slot = -1; for (int i = 1; i < maxNPCs; i++) { if (npcs[i] == null) { slot = i; break; } }[br][size=1]Posted on: July 12, 2007, 07:06:04 PM[/size][hr]hello?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

where would i put this in NPChandler.java?

public void AgressiveAttack(){ for (int z = 0; z < maxNPCs; z++) { if (npcs[z] != null && !npcs[z].IsDead) { for (int j = 1; j < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; j++) { if (server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { if (GoodDistance(npcs[z].absX, npcs[z].absY, server.playerHandler.players[j].absX, server.playerHandler.players[j].absY, 6) == true && npcs[z].heightLevel == server.playerHandler.players[j].heightLevel && server.playerHandler.players[j].combat < npcs[z].AgressiveTo || server.playerHandler.players[j].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(npcs[z].AgressiveToName)) { if(server.playerHandler.players[j].pvpTeam == true){ npcs[z].RandomWalk = false; npcs[z].StartKilling = j; if(npcs[z].npcType == 2025 || npcs[z].npcType == 172 || npcs[z].npcType == 174 || npcs[z].npcType == 1645 || npcs[z].npcType == 509 || npcs[z].npcType == 1241 || npcs[z].npcType == 1246 || npcs[z].npcType == 449){ AttackPlayerMage(z); } else { AttackPlayer(z); } } else { if(server.playerHandler.players[j].killedByPlayer == 0 && server.playerHandler.players[j].killedByNpcs == z || server.playerHandler.players[j].killedByNpcs == 0){ npcs[z].RandomWalk = false; npcs[z].StartKilling = j; if(npcs[z].npcType == 2025 || npcs[z].npcType == 172 || npcs[z].npcType == 174 || npcs[z].npcType == 1645 || npcs[z].npcType == 509 || npcs[z].npcType == 1241 || npcs[z].npcType == 1246 || npcs[z].npcType == 449){ AttackPlayerMage(z); } else { AttackPlayer(z); } } } } } } } } }
